    markDone: "Mark Done",
    close: "Close",

    room: "Room",

    roomService: "Room Service",
    housekeeping: "Housekeeping",

    concierge: "Concierge",

  },
  el: {
    title: "easyhost",
    subtitle: "AI Concierge",
    summary: "Αναφορά",
    online: "Online",
    offline: "Offline",
    owner: "Ιδιοκτήτης",
    staff: "Προσωπικό",
    guest: "Επισκέπτης",
    exit: "Αποχώρηση",
    towels: "Πετσέτες",
    rest: "Εστιατόριο",
    logTitle: "Αρχείο",
    saved: "Αποθηκεύτηκε",
    changeRole: "Αλλαγή Ρόλου",
    aiAssistant: "Maya AI",
    welcome: "Καλώς ήρθατε",
    howCanWeHelp: "Πώς μπορούμε να βοηθήσουμε;",
    openTask: "Ανοιχτή Εργασία",
    markDone: "Ολοκληρώθηκε",

    leads: "Leads",

  }
};

// API Base URL - HARDCODED to ensure connection works
// Priority: env variable > hardcoded local
export const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://127.0.0.1:5000';

// Debug logging
console.log('[easyhost] API URL configured:', API_BASE_URL);
console.log('[easyhost] Env variable REACT_APP_API_URL:', process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'not set - using default');

// SSE Stream URLs
export const SSE_STREAM_URL = `${API_BASE_URL}/api/stream/bookings`;
export const SSE_LEADS_URL = `${API_BASE_URL}/api/stream/leads`;

// Frontend URLs
export const AI_ASSISTANT_URL = 'https://voluble-beignet-896a35.netlify.app/';
export const ROLES = {
  OWNER: 'owner',
  STAFF: 'staff',
  GUEST: 'guest'
};
export const LANGUAGES = {
  HEBREW: 'he',
  ENGLISH: 'en',
  GREEK: 'el'
};

// Service modules
export const SERVICES = {
  ROOM_SERVICE: 'room_service',
  HOUSEKEEPING: 'housekeeping',
  CHECKOUT: 'checkout',
  CONCIERGE: 'concierge'
};

// Polling fallback interval (ms)
export const POLL_INTERVAL = 5000;

// SSE reconnect delay (ms)
export const SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY = 3000;
export default {
  translations,
  API_BASE_URL,
  SSE_STREAM_URL,
  SSE_LEADS_URL,
  AI_ASSISTANT_URL,
  ROLES,
  LANGUAGES,
  SERVICES,
  POLL_INTERVAL,
  SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY
};

sourcesContent:
// Constants and translations for easyhost dashboard

export const translations = {
  he: {
    title: "easyhost",
    subtitle: "AI Concierge",
    summary: "דו\"ח סיכום",
    online: "מחובר",
    offline: "לא מחובר",
    owner: "מנהל",
    staff: "צוות",
    guest: "אורח",
    exit: "יציאה",
    towels: "מגבות",
    rest: "מסעדה",
    logTitle: "יומן פעולות",
    saved: "נשמר",
    changeRole: "החלף תפקיד",
    aiAssistant: "Maya AI",
    welcome: "ברוכים הבאים",
    howCanWeHelp: "במה נוכל לעזור?",
    openTask: "משימה פתוחה",
    markDone: "סמן כבוצע",
    close: "סגור",
    actionsCompleted: "פעולות הושלמו",
    room: "חדר",
    suite: "סוויטה",
    roomService: "שירות חדרים",
    housekeeping: "משק בית",
    checkout: "צ'ק-אאוט",
    concierge: "קונסיירז'",
    leads: "לידים",
    dashboard: "דשבורד",
  },
  en: {
    title: "easyhost",
    subtitle: "AI Concierge",
    summary: "Summary",
    online: "Online",
    offline: "Offline",
    owner: "Owner",
    staff: "Staff",
    guest: "Guest",
    exit: "Checkout",
    towels: "Towels",
    rest: "Restaurant",
    logTitle: "Activity Log",
    saved: "Saved",
    changeRole: "Switch Role",
    aiAssistant: "Maya AI",
    welcome: "Welcome",
    howCanWeHelp: "How can we help?",
    openTask: "Open Task",
    markDone: "Mark Done",
    close: "Close",
    actionsCompleted: "Actions Completed",
    room: "Room",
    suite: "Suite",
    roomService: "Room Service",
    housekeeping: "Housekeeping",
    checkout: "Checkout",
    concierge: "Concierge",
    leads: "Leads",
    dashboard: "Dashboard",
  },
  el: {
    title: "easyhost",
    subtitle: "AI Concierge",
    summary: "Αναφορά",
    online: "Online",
    offline: "Offline",
    owner: "Ιδιοκτήτης",
    staff: "Προσωπικό",
    guest: "Επισκέπτης",
    exit: "Αποχώρηση",
    towels: "Πετσέτες",
    rest: "Εστιατόριο",
    logTitle: "Αρχείο",
    saved: "Αποθηκεύτηκε",
    changeRole: "Αλλαγή Ρόλου",
    aiAssistant: "Maya AI",
    welcome: "Καλώς ήρθατε",
    howCanWeHelp: "Πώς μπορούμε να βοηθήσουμε;",
    openTask: "Ανοιχτή Εργασία",
    markDone: "Ολοκληρώθηκε",
    close: "Κλείσιμο",
    actionsCompleted: "Ενέργειες",
    room: "Δωμάτιο",
    suite: "Σουίτα",
    roomService: "Room Service",
    housekeeping: "Housekeeping",
    checkout: "Checkout",
    concierge: "Concierge",
    leads: "Leads",
    dashboard: "Dashboard",
  },
};

// API Base URL - HARDCODED to ensure connection works
// Priority: env variable > hardcoded local
export const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://127.0.0.1:5000';

// Debug logging
console.log('[easyhost] API URL configured:', API_BASE_URL);
console.log('[easyhost] Env variable REACT_APP_API_URL:', process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'not set - using default');

// SSE Stream URLs
export const SSE_STREAM_URL = `${API_BASE_URL}/api/stream/bookings`;
export const SSE_LEADS_URL = `${API_BASE_URL}/api/stream/leads`;

// Frontend URLs
export const AI_ASSISTANT_URL = 'https://voluble-beignet-896a35.netlify.app/';

export const ROLES = {
  OWNER: 'owner',
  STAFF: 'staff',
  GUEST: 'guest',
};

export const LANGUAGES = {
  HEBREW: 'he',
  ENGLISH: 'en',
  GREEK: 'el',
};

// Service modules
export const SERVICES = {
  ROOM_SERVICE: 'room_service',
  HOUSEKEEPING: 'housekeeping',
  CHECKOUT: 'checkout',
  CONCIERGE: 'concierge',
};

// Polling fallback interval (ms)
export const POLL_INTERVAL = 5000;

// SSE reconnect delay (ms)
export const SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY = 3000;

export default {
  translations,
  API_BASE_URL,
  SSE_STREAM_URL,
  SSE_LEADS_URL,
  AI_ASSISTANT_URL,
  ROLES,
  LANGUAGES,
  SERVICES,
  POLL_INTERVAL,
  SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY,
};
